resources.string: AMD Ryzen Quad Core Gaming PC and Monitor Package#1
AMD RYZEN 5 3600 GAMING PC BUNDLE PROMO Package#2
Processor: AMD RYZEN 5 3600 WITH WRAITH STEALTH COOLER 3RD GEN PCIE GEN 4 READY PROCESSOR
Graphics: GALAX GEFORCE® GTX 1050 TI OC 128-BIT DDR5 - DP 1.4, HDMI 2.0B, DUAL LINK-DVI-D GRAPHIC CARD
Memory: CORSAIR CS-CMG16GX4M2D3600C18-BOX CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS 16GB(2X8GB) DDR4-3600 C18 MEMORY KIT RAM MEMORY CARD
Storage Capacity: GLOWAY 256GB NVME M.2 SOLID STATE DRIVE, SEAGATE BARRACUDA 1TB 3.5 INCH SATA 6 GB/S 7200 RPM 64MB CACHE FOR COMPUTER DESKTOP PC (ST1000DM010) INTERNAL HARD DRIVE
Monitor: GAMDIAS ATLAS VH220F 75HZ 21.5 INCH MONITOR
Product Inclusion: Keyboard REDRAGON K552-BB-1 4 IN 1 SET, Mouse, REDRAGON (GS550) ORPHEUS SOUNDBAR SPEAKERS
Intel Core I3 Desktop Bundle Package#3
Processor: Intel Core I3–9100F 4.2 GHZ Turbo (6MB Cache 4-Core 4-Threads) 9th Gen Coffee Lake R Processor
Graphics: Colorful GT1030 2G V3 EA2V Graphic Card
Product Inclusion: Havit Gamenote KB540CM Combo, Logitech H570E Noise Cancelling, Fantech MP292 Vigil Mousepad, Fantech GS733 Arthas Black Speakers

Storage Capacity: TOSHIBA DYNABOOK BOOST AE100 SATA III 2.5" 240GB SSD (OA1203-PHES) SOLID STATE DRIVE
